detaileddescription.para: Enable or disable Image mode Image mode: when button state changed Image on button also change it's picture. Disabled (false) by default.

briefdescription.para: {Button} Button widget description should be here.

childnode.edgelabel: eventKeySetFocus eventMouseSetFocus eventKeyButtonReleased eventKeyLostFocus eventRootMouseChangeFocus eventMouseWheel eventToolTip eventMouseLostFocus eventRootKeyChangeFocus
